name: Project Name
description:
When they set their sights on bounty hunter Scarlett Martillo, they thought they had an easy target. They thought wrong. Now, she’s on a rampage to settle an old score...



Entertainment Of The Near Future
HOMICIDAL All-Stars is the late 21st century’s most popular - and most brutal - reality game show. In a fraying society increasingly plagued by extreme income inequality, rapacious corporations, climate change-triggered natural disasters and wars, violent crime, and overpopulation, the bloody carnage of HOMICIDAL All-Stars provides a welcome distraction.



Survival Is Not Guaranteed
Each season of the show starts at the beginning of the month and runs every
night until either all contestants are dead or one or more of them has won it all. But now that Scarlett Martillo has joined the competition, this season is about to be bloodier than ever.



Nobody Ever Said The Rules Would Be Fair
The shady Omega Corporation owns a majority stake in the show and is its
primary sponsor; they only care about getting higher ratings… no matter the cost. If changing the rules mid-game means more sensational action - and more viewers - the show’s director is more than willing to throw any semblance of “fairness” aside.

Features
  • [Turn-Based Battles] Battles are turn-based and hand-crafted - with changing goals, various level mechanics, and environmental elements you can use to your advantage during combat.
  • [Real-time exploration] Overcome an obstacle course of deadly traps and lethal puzzles in real-time, but be prepared for an ambush at any corner.
  • [Team Members] Each team member has unique abilities and playstyle. Assemble your team before each battle to match the opposition’s skill set. Your teammates gather experience points in each battle to level up their stats.
  • [Enemies] Your opponents are carefully selected for their special skills and will require a custom approach to take them down.
  • [Gore] Prepare for vicious and gruesome battles filled with gore and flying body parts. Homicidal All-Stars thrives on the blood-spattered entertainment that the audience and sponsors are craving for.
  • [Sponsorships/Fans] Become a star: gain fame by avoiding death, surviving rounds, and eliminating your enemies with gruesome panache. The more you succeed, the more fans you earn; your growing fame will yield increasingly beneficial sponsorship deals.
  • [Setting] Homicidal All-Stars is equal parts Running Man and American Gladiator - with the violence dialed up to eleven - all set in an iconic early 90’s theme.
  • [Twitch Integration] Special mode created for Twitch streamers where your viewers act as the audience and can vote on events in the game. Do they open a door for you, or will they select the explosive barrels? Be ready to join in the Homicidal All-Stars mayhem in a never before seen performance!
